data.question: What is your return policy?
data.description: Items can be returned within 30 days of purchase provided they are in original condition.

data.question: How do I track my order?
data.description: Once your order is shipped, a tracking number will be sent to your registered email.

data.question: Can I cancel my order?
data.description: Orders can be canceled within 24 hours after placing them. Please contact support for assistance.

data.question: Do you offer international shipping?
data.description: Yes, we ship to most countries. Shipping fees and times vary by destination.

data.question: What payment methods are accepted?
data.description: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and other secure payment options.
